summary:
Brussels: ☀️ Avg 20.9°C (1°C range), 0% rain (0% range)
High 26°C / Low 17°C
gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels is set to be sunny, with temperatures peaking at 26°C (78.8°F) and dropping to a comfortable 17°C (63°F) at the lowest. There's no sign of rain according to all sources, making it a perfect day for outdoor activities. Perhaps it's a good day for a visit to the Royal Zoological Society of Antwerp, where the monkeys will be enjoying the sunshine as much as you.
